articles.title: CSA laud record-breaker Brevis: ‘He has been very consistent’
articles.description: Dewald Brevis’ fine showing at the U19 Cricket World Cup has earned him the applause of Cricket South Africa
articles.content:
• Teenage cricket sensation Dewald Brevis smashed 138 from 130 balls in South Africa's 7th/8th place playoff against Bangladesh.
  • His tournament tally moved to 506, one more than previou… [+1768 chars]

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Steve Waugh accuses Cricket Australia of lacking clarity with stance on Justin Langer following resignation
articles.description: The former Test captain says he does not understand the reasons Cricket Australia cited as to why Langer was not in its long-term plans.
articles.content:
Steve Waugh says Cricket Australia (CA) provided "no clarity" in its explanation of why it only offered Justin Langer a short-term contract extension as men's head coach.
Key points:

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Langer resigns as Australia coach
articles.description: Justin Langer resigns as coach of the Australia men's cricket team, ending months of speculation as to whether he would continue in the role.
articles.content:
Justin Langer had been seeking a contract extension
Justin Langer has resigned as coach of the Australia men's cricket team.
The 51-year-old's contract was going to expire at the end of June and he… [+880 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
